creator: nicolas.socheleau@bitflash.com
text:
The SVG DTD 1.0 defines a default attribute for the <svg> element which is 
xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" ( see 
resources/org/apache/batik/dom/svg/resources/svg10.dtd ). The SVGOMSVGElement 
does not define this attribute as a default ( see 
sources/org/apache/batik/dom/svg/SVGOMSVGElement.java ). Would it be possible 
to add this attribute as a default one ?
